Due to congestion/ traffic in normal days, thorough inspection of some of the reaches could not have been satisfactorily undertaken in the past like the reaches/ projects in cities/ towns. 2_ Due to present COVID conditions and less traffic due to lockdown, AEIE & PD may immediately identify and undertake the inspection of all above reaches in next 3-4 duly examining the following and come out with solutions: (i) Poor riding quality especially at   expansion joints of structures and its approaches (flyovers/ elevated roads); (ii) Poor condition of entry/exit to the   project highway and improvements required to ease out the traffic piling up at these points; (iii) Proper drainage including relocation/  shifting of drains and/ or cleaning of drains; (iv) other engineering improvement required in these reaches. 3 ROs may the list of such reaches and inspection report from each PD and submit a consolidated report within a week to Sh: S.K.
